messages.subject: Heike?Taira?
messages.msgSnippet: To the group Can anyone provide a definitive answer (if one even exists) as to the correct useage (and appropriate time of useage) concerning the major players
messages.messageBody:
To the group
Can anyone provide a definitive answer (if one even
exists) as to the correct useage (and appropriate time
of useage) concerning the major players in the War of
1180-85, ie, TAIRA=HEIKE and GENJI=MINAMOTO .
Thanks
M.Lorimer
